name: Videocart-6: Math Quiz I  (Addition & Subtraction)
overview: Get one problem right and a new one appears. Take turns with a buddy for added competition. Plus or minus some fast-paced fun! Math Quiz - Addition: Count on your television instead of your fingers. Right answer scores. You get two chances before the screen shows you how. Arithmetic was never like this! Math Quiz - Subtraction: Your number's up! Brush up on the basics, teach the kids to balance their allowance, or just have fun. It won't take away from the thrill of the game!
